rquery

project data by grouping, and adding aggregate columns.

project data by grouping, and adding aggregate columns.

project_nse(source, groupby, ..., env = parent.frame())

Arguments

source

source to select from.
groupby

grouping columns.
...

new column assignment expressions.
env

environment to look for values in.

Value

project node.

Examples


my_db <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), ":memory:")
d <- dbi_copy_to(my_db, 'd',
                data.frame(AUC = 0.6, R2 = 0.2))
eqn <- project_nse(d, "AUC", v := max(R2))
cat(format(eqn))
#> table('d') %.>%
#>  project(., v := max(R2),
#>   g= AUC)
sql <- to_sql(eqn)
cat(sql)
#> SELECT `AUC`, max(`R2`) AS `v` FROM (
#>  SELECT
#>   `d`.`AUC`,
#>   `d`.`R2`
#>  FROM
#>   `d`
#>  ) tsql_0000
#> GROUP BY
#>  `AUC`
DBI::dbGetQuery(my_db, sql)
#>   AUC   v
#> 1 0.6 0.2
DBI::dbDisconnect(my_db)

  • Value
